website_summaries.verdict: This 50-piece GoPro accessory kit won't break your budget and will serve you well both now and in the future.
pros: Includes a removable triangle suction cup mount that offers 360° rotation capabilities and makes it easy to capture low-angle shots
Comes with a retractable tripod with ball and foldable legs for added convenience
Provides a long, durable wrist strap that you can use to attach a Wi-Fi remote to your arm or wrist
cons: Kit's items are less durable than those available with similar kits
Suction mount tends to shake and rattle when using GoPro

customer_reviews.title: Higher Quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Go Pro 5 for xmas 2018, but it came without accessories. While looking for accessories I noticed it could get expensive buying various items. Thank god for this bundle. A bunch of accessories for a cheap price. I really thought the quality wouldn't be crap, but it is not. Received the bundle complete and the pictures show. Definitely worth the price and a must have for a Go Pro owner.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Multitude of stuff
customer_reviews.text: This kit has a large number gizmos that connect together. Grandson has spent hours trying out the possibilities. Nothing has broken yet so quality seems good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, and valuable.  Very nice set up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quality action camera, without paying the Go Pro price. I’m delighted I found this one. The set up was very easy, as I love touch-screen operations. There are more accessories than I will probany use, but the selection is great for a variety of peoples needs. I will focus on the wrist strap, and the chest harness......
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Halley

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could need
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything I needed and even more great stuff I never knew existed. There is a handy insert that gives you ideas of items to use together to get the results you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my cousin, he really loves surfing and his parents just got him a gopro for his birthday. He said he really likes it and showed me some clips he recorded yesterday while using it for the first time. Little guy is so rad
customer_reviews.author: Feng

customer_reviews.title: so cool!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so cool, I can't believe how pieces it comes with, I'm so excited to try them all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag insert could package better
customer_reviews.text: Solid bag and accessories but the insert was all smoshed when I opened it. Still worth the buy tho.
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Baladad

customer_reviews.title: A connector or gadget for every action cam situation you can think of.
customer_reviews.text: I took inventory of the crazy number of Go-Pro accessories in this kit- amazing! I can't wait to try out the tripod, head gear, and mini selfie stick. There's basically a connector for every situation - including bike riding, canoeing or kayaking (floating connector), hiking, or selfie-style video. Compatible with my Apeman 4K camera. I'll be shooting a lot more video. Case is nice and substantial, if a little big (it's gotta be since there are so many accessories.)
customer_reviews.author: PhilaPhil

customer_reviews.title: Best $22 I’ve ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set for our new GoPro and it came in record time (2dsys) This accessory set is filled with every GoPro add on you can imagine and a couple things you didn’t even think of but are SO handy to have! The hard sided bag it all comes in is worth the money -alone! But his -you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Julezcp

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't pass up getting this 50 in 1 kit for this low price. So many options for getting full use out of my GoPro. I am an avid bicyclist and this kit gives me a few ways to attach my camera while biking - helmet mount, head strap, chest strap, handlebar mount. Really covers all the bases. Everything I have tried out has worked perfectly and was great quality.
customer_reviews.author: haiyan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Something Worth Purchasing for First Time GoPro Users
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing my first GoPro, I knew these accessories were going to be needed. For the price, this is great. So far the suction cup mount is my favorite, especially when driving my car. It holds on nice and tight. If you are looking to save a few bucks and get a number of accessories for your GoPro its worth a shot, however don't expect it to be made of the HIGH GRADE plastic the more expensive products are. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a complete kit, would recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.text: Thought I’d try this kit out to record myself going off some sweet ramps on my skateboard. Can’t beat the price for everything I got. It actually held up really well, I took a few gnarly falls, but the videos turned out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Comes with basics of what you need for your go pro. Love the case, great material. Got it for my husband, he works in Construction. Will update when we try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jahhlovah

customer_reviews.title: Summer is gonna be so fun with this set!
customer_reviews.text: Was going skydiving and wanted to be able to film it on my camera and this came with all the pieces and mounts for it plus more! The reusable fog filters are really useful. The helmet harness and clips kept it completely strapped to me and I was able to get the whole thing on film! I can't wait to use the floater and bike handle mount once it gets a little warmer out. Summer is gonna be so fun with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: For the money, can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: Great set of additional items to supplement the GoPro accessories already purchased. Probably won't utilize 80% of them, but the selfie-stick, tri-pod and a harness make it worthwhile. Probably could use a car mount but I'm not sticking things to my dash; one of these may be a sun-shade gripper or the suction cup for the windshield. (I don't usually read instructions, and they don't provide any)
customer_reviews.author: Just Desserts

customer_reviews.title: Really glad it came with a case for all of it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need plus tons of extras! The items are comfortable to wear and are well made, nothing feels cheap or loose. Excellent amount of options for outdoor play and shooting with my sports camera. Really glad it came with a case for all of it!
customer_reviews.author: Mans

customer_reviews.title: For the price, a great kit, and comes with (what appears to be) actual 3M adhesive, not generic
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great kit. I bought it because it was the only one that showed actual 3M adhesive in the photo, and sure enough it does appear to come with real 3M adhesive, unlike all the other similar accessory packs that just have generic red-backed adhesive. I would rate the attachments the same quality as the original GoPro, aka pretty decent but not as good as the newer official GoPro stuff (like for Hero 4, Hero 5, etc). Some of the more fringe accessories (float, mini-tripod, selfie stick, straps) are pretty low quality, but again for the price I can't complain. If you want an accessory pack for your GoPro, this is a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Sluyter

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: This accessory kit is insane!!! The possibilities really are endless when you have all these pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON"T MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: This comes with A LOT of things... I mean it, A LOT. However, you won't be able to use it, because it does not come with the single, most important accessory, which is the piece to connect the camera to the accessories. That you will have to buy separately, and in all honesty, with that, you will find A LOT BETTER QUALITY, COMPLETE KITS, out there. This kit is a NO NO. I have all these accessories here, but there's no base screw to connect to your camera... so... yes... Useless!
customer_reviews.author: H G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value.  Decent Quality.  Very Satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Highly recommend. You definitely get you money’s worth. Not top quality but I’d say it’s a great assortment to get started with. The foam divider is not rigid enough to hold equipment in place, so I just took mine out and tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: ccargnino

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The wrist one broke after using 2 hours. The selfie stick shakes. The tripod is so sketchy. This is the first time I am giving negative feedback, really don't want to but have to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Peng J.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the sticker mounts, every mount failed by breaking within the first few seconds of any of the activities I used them for. Don't buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mfisher84

customer_reviews.title: ... beach to boogie board I noticed that it was pretty sturdy up until 10 minutes later I noticed my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the housing for the wristband and when I went into the beach to boogie board I noticed that it was pretty sturdy up until 10 minutes later I noticed my GoPro wasn't even attached anymore. So if you find a GoPro hero 5 in Manhattan beach somewhere please send it to me. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for GoPro! :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this right before our honey moon! Man it was worth it! The floaty thing was amazing for scuba diving, and water sports! That alone is as expensive as this entire kit if you get it from GoPro.... Amazing investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jakeking

customer_reviews.title: Bicycle Mount snapped on first ride. Head Mount has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bicycle Mount snapped on first ride. Head Mount has Glue on the part that rests on your skin/hair. Not impressed... Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: A lot of accessories for the price. The adhesives work great and hold on at high wind speeds. The head strap, chest mount, and wrist mount are all on par with the official stuff. The plastic float handle feels a little cheap and would probably break if you drop it on a rock, if you are going into rough water a foam floater might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Rusty material / non durable
customer_reviews.text: There’s a lot of pieces in here lol and if you are a beginner GOOD LUCK because there are no instructions in here. Now I purchased this a few weeks back and when arrived one of the pieces was broken, then this past weekend I went to a water park and used the stick and the screw is now rusty as you can see on the pictures. Will be returning, I rather get less pieces but better quality.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: very good alternative to what GoPro is selling and a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This kit is simple to use and tge attachments are very easy to connect or swap on your GoPro... I used the booey one on an island trip and it worked fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Antonio L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product, unless you're willing to lose your gopro. This product was made cheap, and the mounting of the wrist piece came completely off with my gopro attached in the middle of a lake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I used the bike handlebar mount about five times. Yesterday I was riding, looked down at my camera and thought "why is it shaking so much?" About two seconds later it snapped off, hit the ground, and now my camera is trashed. So I guess you could say I'm not particularly pleased with the quality. I used some of the other attachments and they were fine. There is very little in the way of instructions, so I never could figure out how to install the bike helmet mount. It's moot now, since my camera is dead from the failed handlebar mount.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck W

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit GoPro Hero Black 8
customer_reviews.text: Mostly junk... Foam cut outs do NOT fit Hero 8 at all - ruins the purpose of why I bought it :-( Now I have to buy a new case that does. What a waste of time & money. Other cons: * Mini Tripod cannot be tightened and tips over repeatedly * Helmet Strap doesn't fit or tighten enough to keep from wobbling * Helmet Extender Arm was not tooled correctly and had to be sanded to fit * Suction Cup does not tighten & therefore swings (not stable) Would not buy this item again. Some pros: The chest mount, wrist mount, and extender stick do work pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Tony SImmons

customer_reviews.title: crappy product.
customer_reviews.text: Really pissed. Bought a Hero 5 for a guided trip through Costa Rica. First time I used it was whitewater rafting. I was simply getting out of the raft and jumping into the water and the bracket on the wrist strap broke. New GoPro is now at the bottom of a river is CR. You get what you pay for. Cheap, crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Hall

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of  money... Parts are not very well made
customer_reviews.text: Before I even had a chance to use the mounts the external plastic thread stripped out while mounting for the first time, Since I was heading out the next morning for a 10 day hunting trip, I glued it in place and after a few uses in the field (less than 3 days) the main stem broke off in my hand... very disappointed in the quality. I guess for the $20 I spent I shouldn't expect much but come on - I should get a little use out of it. went to the nearest town about halfway thru the hunt and purchased a go pro snake clamp, worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I wish all the bags were labeled, some things I'm having to guess at. Comes with a very small photo card saying some of the items. I took a sharpie and wrote on the bags what I believe each is. LOTS of stuff in here and really, it needs a bigger tote bag! I don't know if I'd put my Gopro in here though. Super cheap and flimsy padding. And if you leave all the stuff in it with the go pro, you might break something trying to squish it closed. Has a couple of foam openings, they are specialized shapes but not labeled, so not sure exactly what goes where.
customer_reviews.author: Shared Acres

customer_reviews.title: Double sided tape failed
customer_reviews.text: Lost my go pro because of sticky double sided tape failure. The whole thig came off. My helmet had just a piece of the tape stuck to it and thats it. It came off on one of the 10 ft drops i did in deep powder. So no hard impact. Invest in a good double sided tape so you dont lose your go pro like i did.
customer_reviews.author: David P*

customer_reviews.title: BEST SET OUT THERE FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of go pro accessories for any average person just trying to get a cool video. I mostly got it for the chest mount and it is amazing considering the whole set is cheaper than a go pro brand chest mount. I highly recommend you consider buying this set.
customer_reviews.author: greatness

customer_reviews.title: Tons of parts, only used a few
customer_reviews.text: LIKE * Abundance of parts, so many uses * Chest Strap: works well, though with riding have to mount camera upside down to get usable camera angles * Head Strap is good DISLIKE * Overall quality is usable, but poor (get what you pay for) * Helmet strap is a joke * Handle bar mount is a joke, requiring 1 or 2 more extensions to point the camera fwd creating a high mount and adding more instability * Floating underwater handle takes on water (fills up slowly) while snorkeling (only 2-10ft deep water) Have to wrap in absorbent tissue or cloth to slowly draw the water back out over days
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For - BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I should have known from other reviews that this would not be a good quality purchase -- but, alas, I was hopeful. One of the tripod legs broke upon OPENING this package. Another piece in this kit shattered in half within my hands upon it's second use. I have had ZERO luck with this product. It is, in my opinion, pretty much garbage. Every piece within this package looks cheap, feels cheap... IS cheap. Again, this is my own fault for ignoring the previous reviews; but don't be like me! Go purchase some higher quality equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Raini Harris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, and comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this accessory kit for my go pros, and I gotta say. This product is awesome, comes with so many useful things, comes with a bipod, head strap, chest strap , and shoulder clip, and many more. I do not regret buying this, opening it and seeing the different attachments was interesting. The stuff that comes with this package can be pretty much used for any situation. And I fully recommend this to anyone who is deciding on getting any extra stuff for their go pro. You will not regret it and for the price it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cazares

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE For The Go Pro Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure there's anything to dislike about this kit. Great value for the price and you really do get a lot. For someone who's really unsure as to which attachment to get, this massive kit will offer peace of mind in that it is cheap and you can try out many different attachments. I personally find myself using the chest mount a lot for fishing and the head mount for hiking. The selfie stick has come in handy as well as the giant yellow floating handle for days at the swimming hole. I still have pieces I have not used, there is so many!
customer_reviews.author: Ross B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Virtually everything you could possibly use to mount an action cam!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, comprehensive set of Go-Pro style mounts for action cams and any other device that can utilize that style of mounts. The entire package fits in a nice zippered case to keep things together. The items are well-make and provide strong security. I use the kit primarily with an Osmo Action Cam, but also with some other small cams as well. Very pleased with the purchase and it's an easy FIVE STAR rating for me...especially considering the value price! I'm happy to honestly and heartedly recommend the kit! *If you found my review helpful to you, please let Amazon know by clicking the "HELPFUL" button below!
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. TrinkleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Some pieces are ok but a lot have QC issues
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of new thumbscrews and buckles mainly and this had a couple of unique mounts that I had not used before. Overall it's ok and some of the pieces seem like they will work. However, I have had issues with the buckles snapping with very light use. Fortunately I had the GoPro secured otherwise it could have been lost. It makes me question whether I would trust any of the other mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of attachments. All seem pretty good quality, like they will hold up, nothing seemed 'cheap' or broken. The only issue I noticed is the vest is a bit smaller than the official GoPro vest, and if you're a big person you might need to spend the extra bucks and get the more expensive one. But it's still very good quality. I'd buy this again - most like the suction cup, clamp, selfie stick (not something I'd buy separately but this one is good quality also), mini tripod. I wouldn't have use for the wrist strap, floating handle, or head strap, but they are made well, and would work great if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for quality wise - but it's a great kit to jumpstart your action cam
customer_reviews.text: The quality on these isn't outstanding, but it's serviceable. I'd recommend getting a kit like this when you first get your action cam and then buy higher quality versions of the things you find yourself using frequently. You really do get a lot of stuff with this kit for the price (and it's stuff that I probably wouldn't have thought to buy, but ended up glad to have) - so it's hard to not recommend it if you don't have any accessories - but for anything you find yourself using more than a handful of times it'll probably be worth it to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: AberrantRambler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. How do they do it? Some minor gripes...
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit, and am amazed at the ammount of options it includes, and all apparently with pretty good quality. The only part which is missing, and I wish it had been included as claimed, is the bicycle handlebar grip. I can't find it among the large amount of accessories that came with this kit. My other gripe (but what do you want for the low price?) is the quality of the case: it is fine on the outside, but inside it has very flimsy foam which does not match any of the accessories, you have to find your own creative way of using (or not) the foam dividers... No big deal, I love this kit still!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S Langdon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you will use your camera while moving faster than 10 miles an hour
customer_reviews.text: It's cool that it comes with so many pieces. But they easily break. They break with some wind and the weight of the camera. I thought it was just one bad mount until I broke one by hand and it broke so easy I just threw everything away since I needed it to record while riding on a motorcycle. Not worth it. The other attachments fall apart as well. Once you start tightening the screws they split the adjuster in half. Just spend the money on the real gopro mounts. They are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It came with tons of accessories, with some items being 2-3 of the same item. I question the durability of them because, they are made of what appears to be a cheap kind of plastic. Still, nothing has broke yet. There are a few nice options which do come in handy. I didn't keep track of where the add on's were placed in the case and when i took them all out for inspection. I had a terrible time putting the things back in so, the case would close easily. It came with a telescopic sefi stick but, I'm going to buy a better one. All in all, it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W.

customer_reviews.title: You will never need to buy accessories again.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This has everything. The pictures don't do the multitude of stuff you get in this package justice. I don't think I could possibly use everything. The only things it doesn't have are another GoPro and batteries. I don't even own enough things to put all these brackets and clips on. Con: The case wont fit everything in an organized manner. I don't know what things the shaped holes in the foam are for, except for the one shaped like a GoPro... but I fear if I store my GoPro in there with everything else, it might come out destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Hart

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So we purchased this for our family vacation to Colorado. We hiked, did a Little Rock climbing, a lot of driving and sight seeing. My son used the body cam attachment and the bendable tripod the most. Unfortunately the tripod only lasted two days and broke. It was fairly flimsy to begin with. There are a lot of pieces with this package. We have used them all. The suction cup worked perfectly attached to the windshield of our motorhome. Overall for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One price for all accessories, all accessories for one camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with my neewer 16mp action camera to take on our cruise. I figured carrying this around would be a lot cheaper than a one thousand dollar cell phone. I'll tell you what I was very impressed with everything the kit came with. It is a great value for the money and everything seems to be of good quality. I really like the fact that it included an external microphone as well. All in all if you own an action camera this is the kit to go with. The only other thing I could recommend you purchase (besides batteries and memory card) is a water proof remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: For all the attachments you get in this pack, it's a great deal. However, be careful with the wrist strap. With much impact (like jumping in the water), the camera can pop off the wrist. This happened to me when cliff jumping. Luckily I was able to find my GoPro at the bottom of the river I jumped into. From then on, I grab the camera right before hitting the water. Not a perfect solution, but better than losing the camera. Also, the selfie stick is really flimsy. I haven't used it because the weight of a GoPro bends the telescopic stick.
customer_reviews.author: Trago Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a GoPro and are about to travel with it then this is really what you want. It's an amazing deal and you get so much with it. My only problem is that it's really hard to fit everything into the case once you take it all out. But that is not really a big problem. The foam that comes with this is not really great at all. I actually used a different set of foam that was stronger and didn't have as much give as what comes with this product. Other than that everything else about this product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyening

customer_reviews.title: go to another one
customer_reviews.text: the selfie stick didnt screw in.. the octopus arm was wobbly and wont stay upright.. foam holder in the case was smashed and useless.. went with this cause it was a little cheaper than the other one i got a few months ago for another camera.. lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: malisha

customer_reviews.title: really cheap
customer_reviews.text: At first glance you get a ton of stuff. Lots of little buckles and clasps. The yellow handle floats. The tripod will not support the weight of a gopro and neither will the selfie stick. I haven't really tried any of the straps. I wanted the tripod and the floating handle, so...I got 50% of what I wanted. The bag had a uselessly deformed foam rubber insert. I quickly upgraded to a Pelican Tactical case.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Kit
customer_reviews.text: Though there are items included I'll never use, a couple of the mounts makes this kit a bargain. The window mount and the extras bag of thump screws and extensions alone are worth the price of the entire kit. Add the chest harness, bike mount, wrist mount, head mount, strap clamp, and the price of the kit is substantially less expensive than buying them individually. The other doodads are a bonus. Granted, all are made in China, but so are almost all GoPro accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this mount for my GoPro I now have nearly 30 minutes of footage of people pointing and laughing at me at the grocery store that I would not have been able to capture without it. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: worth the price...
customer_reviews.text: I like this ser a lot.... it's cheap and suitable!!! It brings so many good things to be used with my go pro!!! I highly recommended it!!! I suggest you to read the instructions for every tool it brings... every tool has it specific part therefore if you want to get the best out of it make sure you pay attention to the instructions!!! The case is pretty cool just the sponge that brings to separate things is a little flimsy, but it's fine for me!!! It's a really good set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit, screws rust easily, quality is ok...
customer_reviews.text: The items fit perfectly with my DJI Osmo Action camera! The water float works excellent. I had an issue with the tripod stand breaking after a few brief uses. Had to use plyers to remove the screw. The window suction mount is sturdy and has options for moving forward and backward, but no swivel options for left and right. The clip connector is robust and secures to straps. The other connectors offer several mountable options, though they could be stronger. My biggest complaint is the quality of the tripod, plastic accessories seem brittle, and the screw connectors also do not fair well for saltwater. Overall, I am still pleased I got this "starter" kit. I will upgrade accessories as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: You are getting more than what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces in this kit are sturdy and work great. No problems, or issues with anything and everything fits like its supposed to. The hard case that it comes with is nice too, but if you want to complain about something, it would be the foam inside. The cutouts look a little generic but it doesn't matter anyway because you can still fit everything in there. I don't regret buying this at all and I might buy a few more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chandrick Walton

customer_reviews.title: Some Kits are too Loose to Hold the GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit set for my GoPro 7 but very disappointed because the most important 2 parts just don't work as expected. The "Mini Retractable Tripod with Ball Head and Foldable Legs" comes with loose neck that cannot even hold the head, so don't expect that it will hold your camera. Also, there is no way you can tie the neck even a little bit, there is just no that way. And the "Removable triangle suction cup mount" is too loose to keep the camera, too. Once you start to drive, the camera will start wave.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: As big as it looks, no room for GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and thought 💭 wow great!! Everything in its place and a place for everything. Well short lived. Although everything works ok with my GoPro and adheres and acres on tightly etc I find the case to be small and not well organized if you will. Once things are out of the case they don’t fit back properly and the case is hard to close. They’re is no place for the GoPro and it’s small!!! The cutouts don’t make much sense. I have to now try and find a bigger case to fit everything on.
customer_reviews.author: toughpr

customer_reviews.title: Needs labels and instructions
customer_reviews.text: It looks like there are lots of useful accessories, however, there are no instructions on how to use them. I can not figure out how to attach the camera to any of the accessories. There is one that appears to be used for underwater shots, but there is no description to verify that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harlan

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comprehensive package for any type of mounting for your go pro camera! I have the Hero 7 which I've only used a couple of times, but this package bundle inspires me to read up more on my camera and learn how I can use all of these attachments. The price for this on the lightning deal blew my mind so I knew I had to get it. I also like how the seller provided a small pamphlet with instructions on how to use all the mounts and what to assemble with the pieces. Super cool set with a nice, sturdy carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Karin E Challis

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most critical piece.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the things this kit contains, it doesn't have a single 90 degree arm.. This is probably the most essential thing you would need to mounting a GoPro to a helmet. For that reason, I cannot give this kit a good rating. On another note, everything was jammed into the carrier case that contains all the pieces. It was jammed in such a was that the styrofoam that is inside is all ruined and flimsy and completely useless. The quality of the plastics and metal pieces is also noticeably weak compared to anything that came with my GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: The monopod had a flaw in it from the get go...
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the price but the a few of the critical pieces are not really going to last. The monopod had a flaw in it from the get go so that was disappointing since it was the first piece in this kit that planned to use a lot. It will be getting replaced with something else eventually. The monopod extends and at the tip where the metal is holding the plastic mount is loose so the stabilty is affected. The piece on this that pivots is also not a tight fit so it flexes when it shouldn't. However, the extra mounting pieces that come with this makes this worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of mounts but you will need another case for the items in the case... LOL
customer_reviews.text: This comes with every possible mount you could think of or ever need or use with an action cam. It is in a case that is also meant to keep your action cam and accessories but it is so jammed pack with all of the cool mounts and other included items that you will NOT be able to keep them all in the same case. Plan on keeping most of the items elsewhere and only put what you actually need in the zippered case... regardless it is an awesome deal...
customer_reviews.author: FLSouthPaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: There is literally a piece for everything you could ever wanna do in this set. I have the camera as well as expected everything fits perfectly with it. Good tension and secure attachments. Super sticky pads and clear filtering with the anti fog inserts. The bendy leg tripod is so cool, stands straight or wraps around whatever I want, I've gotten some really cool angles with it that I wouldn't get otherwise with a regular mini tripod. The selfie stick has been awesome too, I always wanted one, quilty pleasure and now I'm obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Gill Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Product broke with the GoPro on it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this project about a year ago only using a view items. I was especially excited about the tripod but I didn’t even get a chance to use it before it broke. Recently, I used the arm strap for the first time as I was paddling in the ocean. Somehow, the twisty part broke and fell off with the GoPro on. I ended up losing a $200 camera due to this product breaking. PLEASE BE CAUTIOUS WHEN BUYING THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Lost my GoPro to the Lake because of this order.
customer_reviews.text: Used the handlebar mount from the set to mount my GoPro to my SUP paddle. First time using the mount installed correctly and tightened with tool provided I fell once of the inflatable stand up paddle board. And it was gone. I don’t even remember the paddle hitting the board even so it’s a inflatable so it’s not as hard as a hard board. Anyway it’s now on the bottom of the lake to deep and murky to ever be found. Save yourself a lot of money and buy quality. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: You can tell the quality isn't top notch, but it is good enough. Almost every attachment for your go pro and everything works as intended. If you have a new go pro and don't have any attachments I would recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cornwall

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing assortment of accessories for my new Go Pro, most with a respectable build quality. A few items had a tight fit with the adapter but once you get the holes aligned the screw mount fits securely. I wouldn’t trust the suction cup mount anyplace outside your vehicle, but for inside the windshield, it would be fine. The bendy tripod is too wobbly in the stem, but everything else seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Quality Shows It
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you get a lot of stuff. However I've already had two things break- the plastic tip to the flexible tripod mount leg popped off and the threaded base to the selfie stick popped out (was poorly crimped). Most of the items are pretty solid with a low risk of failure, so I'll be keeping it but if you're looking for quality mounts, I cannot recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: JayZee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff, bad case/foam
customer_reviews.text: The kit itself is fine, lots of accessories that seem ok so far. The storage foam in the case is utter garbage, though; whoever packed this thing did to where all the accessories squished and deformed all the foam, which is is thin and flimsy to begin with. And since it's so chincy and cut completely through, it won't hold anything it's formed to hold. Everything just kinda slides around on the case backing. Precut foam can't be cut like this and hold anything.
customer_reviews.author: OneRaisedEyebrow

customer_reviews.title: Well worth 24 buck
customer_reviews.text: Im not jumping out of a plane videoing myself so i dont need a redbull camera mount ..but for all my needs to play with my Hero 7 and have a great time ,,this kit is well worth 24 bucks, one thing i kept reading was the suction holder did not work well..i found it worked great and had a hard time removing it..so im very pleased with the kit..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many accessories!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for gopro accessories and most of them are very expensive and don’t come with that many accessories. I was looking at reviews on this product and the reviews are pretty good. I ended up purchasing this because of the price and the amount of accessories it has. It is an extremely good value for the price! Everything works as it should. No issues whatsoever with any of the accessories. They seem to be of good quality, but only time will tell. Give it a try, it’s less than $20 for a crazy amount of accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Kressler

customer_reviews.title: suction cup and tripod are worthless
customer_reviews.text: so far I have used everything in the kit and it all just seems "ok". the small foam tripod broke when pulling the legs apart to stand it up. luckily my brand new gopro didnt break falling almost 2 stories when the suction cup was mounted to a window (window was clean and initial suction felt strong). I was grabbing something and heard it crash into the driveway and seen my gopro laying on the ground. the head mount and chest mount seem sturdy as well as the other mounts. my only complaint is the suction cup and tripod are garbage .
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice action camera accessory kit. Good quality parts. I just wish the carrying case was slightly larger. It's almost hard to close after putting my action camera and all its accessories into the case with everything else that came with this. More separate pockets would be good too instead of everything having to go into the top net pocket and the limited slots on the bottom. It's a great value other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Norm E.

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy for $20
customer_reviews.text: I have a GoPro Hero 5 and every attachment does or looks like it will fit. Quality looks solid and for $20 it’s a solid deal to also come with a case and pouch. My only gripe and the reason I’m giving this 4 stars instead of 5 is that I wish they would’ve put in the extra effort with the foam and cut it to so everything would fit in case nice and neat. Other than that I feel like this a nice choice.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I actually give this product zero stars but amazon wouldn’t let me review without giving at least one! First time I used it the wrist piece snapped off and I lost my go pro to the ocean. I give this negative stars because it didn’t take long for it to snap off. I caught one wave and it immediately snapped off. Waste of money and ended up costing me money in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Josie V

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for twenty something dollars
customer_reviews.text: Consider what I paid for, these accessories are ok. I have yet to try everything but the helmet strap was difficult to strap to my bike helmet. After I did, I set up the gopro and because of the weight of the camera, the whole thing just wobbled so much that there's no way you can get good and stabilized video clips from it. I stabilized the contraption by inserting enough sponge in the area between the bottom of the strap bracket and the top of the helmet. I can keep updating my review if I get to use other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: KWLVT

customer_reviews.title: Great gear, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the accessories, the wrist on was great out on the field for filming a paintball event, very nice perspective was obtained, even when taking multiple shots, was not swiveled or messed with, the lock on the Gizmo was a great help and felt like it was not even there. The clip one I use for car rides and the extension arm is a huge help, I use this package with my hero5 session and I must say it is great, works well with roller coasters and rides as well. Just screen tightly 🤙
customer_reviews.author: Ru G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! All I need and great value.
customer_reviews.text: More than most will need, and you will have lots of extra pieces to work with if you are creative there are many things you can do. I have not taken the floating handle in the water yet, but I don't see any reason mine would fill with water. If you're using these accessories for extream mountain biking of something that would put a great deal of stress and force on your gear, you might want to pay a lot more for the appropriate gear. For the general user, it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Herbicat

customer_reviews.title: Hey its the pack from that one review on youtube
customer_reviews.text: Everything is in here, watch that Youtube video. The stuff is cheap, but think of it as a trial version. If you get frustrated with the part that cost literally one dollar, then just go on the Go Pro shop and buy the professional one. Otherwise it has everything you need to get started. Some of the stuff can be frustrating, but hey its, what, 20 bucks???
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dalos

customer_reviews.title: Accessories seem good so far but the case and minipod are broken after little use
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a lot of the devices are going to be okay for this collection especially given the price. But...my case after only a few uses has issues. The zipper kept getting stuck in the fabric of the case and eventually broke so now case won't close. The small tripod broke at the threaded part as I was twisting the camera to reposition it for a shot. I was not handling it that roughly I thought either. Overall, probably still a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not GoPro brand but works
customer_reviews.text: You can 100% tell these aren’t official GoPro brand quality. They actually feel kinda cheap at times. I’ve used this kit for multiple different things and all clips have held on tight. Never had an issue with anything coming unclipped. The screw to hold your GoPro in place comes loose and the GoPro moves if you’re using it for cycling and riding over rough roads. So you have to constantly be checking to make sure you’re getting the shot you want
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Slush

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but good
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for here... cheep mounts they all work ok, I broke the selfie stick I wouldn’t recommend that unless you have the small go pro my hero was to heavy for it the rest of them are made with cheep plastic, I got this for the chest mount mainly and that works well if your doing something that’s more intense don’t get this but if your looking for a few different mounts for more leisurely activities these are great
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: More "stuff" in the kit.
customer_reviews.text: The kit has everything in it that a person needs to strap it on or hold it or mount it than I will ever need. The chest strap is what I use mostly and it works well though may be on the small side for a big person or when heavy coats are worn. It is not that bad though, just a little tight. I did put the camera on a pad in the car and the mount worked well. The mount is still there. Over all, I think it is a good purchase for what all you get with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Missing Manual, Jumbled Mess
customer_reviews.text: I havent determined if I like this yet or not. It's hard to do that when the kit did not include a manual describing what each item is. I have no clue what the majority of these devices do. Ill have to figure it out by trial and error I guess. Besides the missing manual, everything was just thrown into the kit helter skelter so its a jumbled mess. Not very professional, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Good starter package
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a trip coming up and needed a few attachments. This fit the bill with all it has. Construction of pieces is on par for what you pay. The positive: You get all the attachments you could need in one kit. Not for extreme sports/events. The Negative: The case is hardshell but the internal padding/compartments is pitiful. The body holster is good for a small/medium person....a big,big person can hang it up. Use the suction cup holder in a car, never outside a car. Make sure all attachments are locked down tight but don't over tighten. I have not used the wrist strap, helmet strap or the stickies.
customer_reviews.author: John Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the kit isn't bad. There are a number of items that will never be used and a few things that you wouldn't want to use. The suction cup is strong, but the screw clamp cannot hold the weight of the GoPro, so it will gradually sag over time.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedCultureStudios

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile accessory kit. The price is good and there are allot of configurations for your imagination to use. I have yet to break any of these, but they "feel" as if they would break if I tightened or stressed them too much. The plastics "feel" brittle to me. I am pleased with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Last Days Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: I was originally going to go with the official go-pro accessories, but after seeing this kit online I had to give it a shot. I haven't used everything, and probably won't ever use it all (although having the option is nice), but the quality is great. The components I have used so far have all worked out well for me. I imagine the quality is less than the much more expensive accessories (id hope so anyway), but for your average user id highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for buck kit out there. Everything feels sturdy and works flawlessly with Osmo Pocket. Suction cup mount will be the first to wear out tho, its rotation lock is basic and wont take long to start slipping. Other than that you want do much better than this since pretty much every kit around this price point looks like the same stuff repackaged, why not get the cheapest one?
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variety
customer_reviews.text: Perfect variety for our GoPro Heroplus. We’ve used almost every item and they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Student

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Filled of accessories at good price
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase. Filled of accessories at good price. It comes with all accesories showed in the photos and mentioned in the product description. Feels very solid, the only poor quality piece it's the selfie stick, it's not totally useless, but have a lot of free looseness. I did not expect much for the "Gorillapod" style mini tripod, but it's remarkably solid, all plastic, but strong. The suction cup works very well. With these two things i've already done for that price! all the other accesories are good too!
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Classen

customer_reviews.title: Good variety for the price, but a little on the cheap side
customer_reviews.text: I needed a few attachments for a GoPro, and this looked like an inexpensive, versatile option. It comes with many attachments, but some of them are cheaply made. For instance, the 'wrist strap' for the GoPro remote is way too small to wear on your wrist. All-in-all, though, it was worth the money, even though I have only used about 1/10 of the stuff it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: NOT genuine 3M sticky pads.
customer_reviews.text: Not genuine 3M sticky pads. Literally the entire reason I bought this accessory pack was for the 3M pads. It’s cheaper to just buy this accessory pack than buy a pack of pads, you get the same amount. The only problem is, the sticky pads you receive are NOT genuine 3M pads as pictured in the amazon listing. I don’t know about you, but I’m not risking my $500 MAX I just got on a 3rd party $2 sticky pad. Hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: dbark

customer_reviews.title: Broke my mounting system
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great! Like the other reviews mention the materials aren't the best quality but they are pretty dam good. There's only one complaint it broke my gopro's internal mount. This wouldn't be a problem if it wasn't the gopro hero + (the camera is built into the case). Some good old super glue fixed it up but I should still mention tightening to hard can be a problem. I would have given this an almost 5 star rating because of its value if it didn't screw up my gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Beckett K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, especially when you don't know what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I'm brand new to using GoPro cameras and I wasn't sure what I needed in the way of accessories, so this package really fit the bill by providing lots of options to experiment with. That said, everything is inexpensively made and you shouldn't expect them to be as durable as something made out of steel or aluminum would be.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: You get a whole lot for the price. I was lookong for a few a few accessories and this is almost perfect. The ammount of things you get for this price are really astounding. The only flaw I have found so far is the case cutouts are extremely out of whack. The spot to hold the camera is about twice as big as it should be. That is my only issue. There are 49 other pieces that are exaclty what they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Fossilfiction

product_meta.title: Neewer 50-In-1 Action Camera Accessory Kit Compatible with GoPro Hero 8 Max 7 6 5 4 Black GoPro 2018 Session Fusion Silver White Insta360 DJI AKASO APEMAN Campark SJCAM Action Camera etc
product_meta.description: Color:BlackNote: 1. The GoPro is not included. 2. For Nikon, Sony sports DV and other action cameras, there need another conversion adapter to mount on those accessories. (Conversion adapter is not included in this accessories kit. )3. The Selfie stick is made of metal and packed by random color(either Black or red). large carrying case: This carrying case is designed for GoPro Hero 1/2/3/3+/4/5/6/7/5 Session/4 Session/ Hero Session SJ4000/5000/6000 cameras and accessories. the inside has foam cutouts to fit the GoPro cameras and accessories. strap is elastic and made with breathable material which ensures wearing comfort. mount your camera flat against your wrist, adjust the recording angle More conveniently suitable for: GoPro Hero 4/5 Session, Hero 1/2/3/3+/4/5/6/7, SJ4000/5000/6000/7000 material: nylon Fastening tape + pc package contents: 1 * suction cup 1 * floating handle grip 1 * strap 1 * 360-degree Rotation clip 1 * insurance tether straps 1 * wrist strap 1 * handheld monopod 1 * bicycle handlebar * chest strap 1 * head strap mount 1 * wrench 1 * wrist mount with screw 1 * Tripod mount adapters * car ring case1 * helmet extension arm 1 * helmet strap mount 1 * mini tripod 2 * switch support 2 * surface J-Hook buckle 3 * basic mount 3 * Flat mounts 2 * curved mounts 4 * screws 5 * adhesive pads 12 * anti-fog inserts
feature_bullets: Removable triangle suction cup mount £ºSucker with CNC processed aluminum adapter pad and plastic screw.Work with GoPro for low angle shot, strong and firm suction to reduce the vibration.
WiFi Remote Fastening Tape Wrist Strap: Long enough to fit around bulky ski coats or just around your wrist comfortably. Attach your WiFi Remote to your wrist, arm, bike handle, steering wheel
Backpack Strap Quick Release Clip Clamp Mount 360 Degree Rotation: 360 degree rotation, the direction and the angle can meet users' needs.Easily clip or remove it at the backpack,hat .etc.
Mini Retractable Tripod with Ball Head and Foldable Legs£¨Silver£:Small, Lightweight and portable, easy to store. Suitable for all kind of camera, digital cameras, web cameras and camcorders.
